languages.text: "Эх, старый добрый Даргонус... без Леди Теодоры здесь скучновато — уж она-то любила взбодрить местное сонное царство парой-тройкой безумных указов и публичных порок зазевавшихся дворян!"
"Ah, good old Dargonus... It's boring here without Lady Theodora — she loved to liven up this sleepy little place with a couple of crazy decrees and public floggings of flabbergasted nobles!"
languages.original_text: "Эх, старый добрый Даргонус... без Леди Теодоры здесь скучновато — уж она-то любила взбодрить местное сонное царство парой-тройкой безумных указов и публичных порок зазевавшихся дворян!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, good old Dargonus... It's boring here without Lady Theodora — she loved to liven up this sleepy little place with a couple of crazy decrees and public floggings of flabbergasted nobles!"
"Ah, good old Dargonus... It's boring here without Lady Theodora — she loved to liven up this sleepy little place with a couple of crazy decrees and public floggings of flabbergasted nobles!"
"Ah, good old Dargonus... It's boring here without Lady Theodora — she loved to liven up this sleepy little place with a couple of crazy decrees and public floggings of flabbergasted nobles!"

languages.text: “啊，美丽的老达戈努斯……西奥多拉夫人不在了，这个地方也变得无聊起来。她以前很喜欢颁布疯狂的法令，或是公开鞭打那些目瞪口呆的贵族，让这个小地方充满活力！”
languages.original_text: "Ah, good old Dargonus... It's boring here without Lady Theodora — she loved to liven up this sleepy little place with a couple of crazy decrees and public floggings of flabbergasted nobles!"

traits.locale_text: “啊，美丽的老达戈努斯……西奥多拉夫人不在了，这个地方也变得无聊起来。她以前很喜欢颁布疯狂的法令，或是公开鞭打那些目瞪口呆的贵族，让这个小地方充满活力！”

languages.text: «Ah, Dargonus... es muy aburrido sin lady Theodora. ¡Le encantaba animar el cotarro con decretos alocados y latigazos en público a nobles sorprendidos!».
languages.original_text: "Ah, good old Dargonus... It's boring here without Lady Theodora — she loved to liven up this sleepy little place with a couple of crazy decrees and public floggings of flabbergasted nobles!"

traits.locale_text: «Ah, Dargonus... es muy aburrido sin lady Theodora. ¡Le encantaba animar el cotarro con decretos alocados y latigazos en público a nobles sorprendidos!».

languages.text: 「ああ、昔のダルゴナスはよかった…。レディ・シオドーラがいないと退屈だ…このまどろむような小さい場所を、突拍子もない法令と呆然とする貴族の公開鞭打ちで活気づけるのが大好きな方だったの！」
languages.original_text: "Ah, good old Dargonus... It's boring here without Lady Theodora — she loved to liven up this sleepy little place with a couple of crazy decrees and public floggings of flabbergasted nobles!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、昔のダルゴナスはよかった…。レディ・シオドーラがいないと退屈だ…このまどろむような小さい場所を、突拍子もない法令と呆然とする貴族の公開鞭打ちで活気づけるのが大好きな方だったの！」

languages.text: "Ah, gutes altes Dargonus ... Es ist langweilig hier ohne Lady Theodora. Sie hat diesen verschlafenen kleinen Ort immer mit Wonne lebendiger gemacht – mit verrückten Erlassen und öffentlichen Auspeitschungen entgeisterter Adliger!"
languages.original_text: "Ah, good old Dargonus... It's boring here without Lady Theodora — she loved to liven up this sleepy little place with a couple of crazy decrees and public floggings of flabbergasted nobles!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, gutes altes Dargonus ... Es ist langweilig hier ohne Lady Theodora. Sie hat diesen verschlafenen kleinen Ort immer mit Wonne lebendiger gemacht – mit verrückten Erlassen und öffentlichen Auspeitschungen entgeisterter Adliger!"

languages.text: « Ah, ce bon vieux monde de Dargonus... Il est d'un ennui aujourd'hui, sans dame Théodora. Ses décrets loufoques et ses séances de flagellation publique de nobles ahuris avaient le don d'égayer l'endroit ! »
languages.original_text: "Ah, good old Dargonus... It's boring here without Lady Theodora — she loved to liven up this sleepy little place with a couple of crazy decrees and public floggings of flabbergasted nobles!"

traits.locale_text: « Ah, ce bon vieux monde de Dargonus... Il est d'un ennui aujourd'hui, sans dame Théodora. Ses décrets loufoques et ses séances de flagellation publique de nobles ahuris avaient le don d'égayer l'endroit ! »

languages.text: "Ah, şu Dargonus hiç mi değişmez... Leydi Theodora olmayınca burası ne de sıkıcıymış... Leydi Theodora, acayip fermanlar verip şaşkın soyluları ortalık yerde kırbaçlatarak durgun memleketimize heyecan katmaya bayılırdı!"
languages.original_text: "Ah, good old Dargonus... It's boring here without Lady Theodora — she loved to liven up this sleepy little place with a couple of crazy decrees and public floggings of flabbergasted nobles!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, şu Dargonus hiç mi değişmez... Leydi Theodora olmayınca burası ne de sıkıcıymış... Leydi Theodora, acayip fermanlar verip şaşkına dönmüş soyluları herkesin gözü önünde kırbaçlatarak şu durgun ortama heyecan katmaya bayılırdı!"
